@dev returns the converter type the factory is associated with
 @return converter type

@dev returns the converter type the factory is associated with
 @return converter type

converterType().details: returns the converter type the factory is associated with

createConverter(address,address,uint32).details: creates a new converter with the given arguments and transfers the ownership to the caller

params._maxConversionFee: maximum conversion fee, represented in ppm
params._registry: address of a contract registry contract
